body: Hey, So I´m pretty bored and I´m with 39 degrees of fever, So A.M.A(Ask me Anything)
body_tagged: Hey, So I´m pretty bored and I´m with 39 degrees of fever, So A.M.A(Ask me Anything)
title: Hello!!!! Ama :D(IStrafeer_)

replies.body:
How did you find Avicus?
What is your favorite part about MC?
What was your first ever MC server?
What other games beside MC do you enjoy playing?

And get better soon :D

Thanks for replying :)
